Note.text: If you are under the age of 18 years old you have to be accompanied by an adult over the age of 18 to stay at this hotel/apartment.

All stays in a hotel/apartment must pay 0.75 € per day per person if they stay in hotels of 1-2-3 stars 1.25 € per day per person if they stay in hotels of 4 stars and 2.5 € per day per person if they stay in 5 star hotels. This city tax is paid on check in/out directly to the hotel/apartment.

Important Information: Children under 18 years old will not be able to stay alone at the hotel. In this case, they must present an authorization signed by their parents or legal guardian, attaching their identity document. - City tax: Barcelona hotels charge a nominal daily City Tourist Tax directly to the customer. Local regulations state this must be collected by the hotel and cannot be prepaid. Please don’t hesitate to contact our call-centre if you require further information.

CancellationPolicy.text: Cancellation made less than 60 hours (12:00) prior to the arrival will be charged with 51% of the total booking value.
